duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical leadership in a post-sales capacity to guide strategic customers as they design and implement big data projects, ranging from architectural design to data engineering to model deployment.
Identify and drive new initiatives that enable customers to turn their data into actionable business value and align these initiatives with their business outcomes for continued success.
Architect production-level workloads, including end-to-end pipeline load performance testing and optimization.
Deliver tutorials and training to drive community adoption (including hackathons, conference presentations, etc.)
Work closely with Engineering and Product Management to drive the direction of the Databricks product.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Data Engineering, or a related field (Master's preferred)
